00026 // define some circulation/loan status
00027 define('LOAN_LIMIT_REACHED', 1);
00028 define('ITEM_NOT_FOUND', 2);
00029 define('ITEM_SESSION_ADDED', 3);
00030 define('ITEM_UNAVAILABLE', 4);
00031 define('TRANS_FLUSH_ERROR', 5);
00032 define('TRANS_FLUSH_SUCCESS', 6);
00033 define('LOAN_NOT_PERMITTED', 7);
00034 define('LOAN_NOT_PERMITTED_PENDING', 8);
00035 define('ITEM_LOAN_FORBID', 9);
00036 define('ITEM_RESERVED', 10);
00037 
00038 class circulation extends member
00039 {
00040     protected $loan_limit = 0;
00041     protected $loan_periode = 0;
00042     protected $reborrow_limit = 0;
00043     protected $fine_each_day = 0;
00044     protected $item_loan_rules = 0;
00045     protected $overdue_days = 0;
00046     protected $grace_periode = 0;
00047     public $holiday_dayname = array('Sun');
00048     public $holiday_date = array();
00049     public $loan_have_overdue = false;

00057     public function __construct($obj_db, $str_member_id)
00058     {
00059         parent::__construct($obj_db, $str_member_id);
00060         $this->loan_limit = intval($this->member_type_prop['loan_limit']);
00061         $this->loan_periode = intval($this->member_type_prop['loan_periode']);
00062         $this->reborrow_limit = intval($this->member_type_prop['reborrow_limit']);
00063         $this->fine_each_day = intval($this->member_type_prop['fine_each_day']);
00064         $this->grace_periode = intval($this->member_type_prop['grace_periode']);
00065     }

00068     /*
00069      * Set complex loan rules
00070      * @return  void
00071      **/
00072     public function setLoanRules($int_coll_type = 0, $int_gmd_id = 0)
00073     {
00074         // if the collection type and gmd is not specified
00075         // get from the membership type directly
00076         if (!$int_coll_type AND !$int_gmd_id) {
00077             return;
00078         }
00079 
00080         $ctype_string = '';
00081         if ($int_coll_type) {
00082             $ctype_string .= ' AND coll_type_id='.intval($int_coll_type).' ';
00083         }
00084         $gmd_string = '';
00085         if ($int_gmd_id) {
00086             $gmd_string .= ' AND gmd_id='.intval($int_gmd_id).' ';
00087         }
00088 
00089         // get the data from the loan rules table
00090         $_loan_rules_q = $this->obj_db->query("SELECT * FROM mst_loan_rules
00091             WHERE member_type_id=".intval($this->member_type_id)." $ctype_string $gmd_string");
00092         // check if the loan rules exists
00093         if ($_loan_rules_q->num_rows > 0) {
00094             $_loan_rules_d = $_loan_rules_q->fetch_assoc();
00095             $this->loan_limit = $_loan_rules_d['loan_limit'];
00096             $this->loan_periode = $_loan_rules_d['loan_periode'];
00097             $this->reborrow_limit = $_loan_rules_d['reborrow_limit'];
00098             $this->fine_each_day = $_loan_rules_d['fine_each_day'];
00099             $this->grace_periode = $_loan_rules_d['grace_periode'];
00100             $this->item_loan_rules = $_loan_rules_d['loan_rules_id'];
00101         } else {
00102             // get data from the loan rules table with collection type specified but GMD not specified
00103             $_loan_rules_q = $this->obj_db->query("SELECT * FROM mst_loan_rules
00104                 WHERE member_type_id=".intval($this->member_type_id)." $ctype_string");
00105             // check if the loan rules exists
00106             if ($_loan_rules_q->num_rows > 0) {
00107                 $_loan_rules_d = $_loan_rules_q->fetch_assoc();
00108                 $this->loan_limit = $_loan_rules_d['loan_limit'];
00109                 $this->loan_periode = $_loan_rules_d['loan_periode'];
00110                 $this->reborrow_limit = $_loan_rules_d['reborrow_limit'];
00111                 $this->fine_each_day = $_loan_rules_d['fine_each_day'];
00112                 $this->grace_periode = $_loan_rules_d['grace_periode'];
00113                 $this->item_loan_rules = $_loan_rules_d['loan_rules_id'];
00114             } else {
00115                 // get data from the loan rules table with GMD specified but collection type not specified
00116                 $_loan_rules_q = $this->obj_db->query("SELECT * FROM mst_loan_rules
00117                     WHERE member_type_id=".intval($this->member_type_id)." $gmd_string");
00118                 // check if the loan rules exists
00119                 if ($_loan_rules_q->num_rows > 0) {
00120                     $_loan_rules_d = $_loan_rules_q->fetch_assoc();
00121                     $this->loan_limit = $_loan_rules_d['loan_limit'];
00122                     $this->loan_periode = $_loan_rules_d['loan_periode'];
00123                     $this->reborrow_limit = $_loan_rules_d['reborrow_limit'];
00124                     $this->fine_each_day = $_loan_rules_d['fine_each_day'];
00125                     $this->grace_periode = $_loan_rules_d['grace_periode'];
00126                     $this->item_loan_rules = $_loan_rules_d['loan_rules_id'];
00127                 }
00128             }
00129         }
00130         // destroy query object
00131         unset($_loan_rules_q);
00132     }

00141     public function addLoanSession($str_item_code, $bool_ignore_rules = false)
00142     {
00143         // you cant borrow any collection if your membership is expired or in pending state
00144         if ($this->is_expire) {
00145             return LOAN_NOT_PERMITTED;
00146         }
00147         if ($this->is_pending) {
00148             return LOAN_NOT_PERMITTED_PENDING;
00149         }
00150         $_q = $this->obj_db->query("SELECT b.title, i.coll_type_id, b.gmd_id, ist.no_loan FROM biblio AS b
00151             LEFT JOIN item AS i ON b.biblio_id=i.biblio_id
00152             LEFT JOIN mst_item_status AS ist ON i.item_status_id=ist.item_status_id
00153             WHERE i.item_code='$str_item_code'");
00154         $_d = $_q->fetch_row();
00155         if ($_q->num_rows > 0) {
00156             // first, check for availability for this item
00157             $_avail_q = $this->obj_db->query("SELECT item_code FROM loan AS L
00158                 WHERE L.item_code='$str_item_code' AND L.is_lent=1 AND L.is_return=0");
00159             // if we find any record then it means the item is unavailable
00160             if ($_avail_q->num_rows > 0) {
00161                 return ITEM_UNAVAILABLE;
00162             }
00163             // check loan status for item
00164             if ((integer)$_d[3] > 0) {
00165     return ITEM_LOAN_FORBID;
00166             }
00167             // check if loan rules are ignored
00168             if (!defined('IGNORE_LOAN_RULES')) {
00169                 // check if this item is being reserved by other member
00170                 $_resv_q = $this->obj_db->query("SELECT l.loan_id FROM reserve AS rs
00171                     INNER JOIN loan AS l ON rs.item_code=l.item_code
00172                     WHERE rs.item_code='$str_item_code' AND rs.member_id!='".$_SESSION['memberID']."'");
00173                 if ($_resv_q->num_rows > 0) {
00174                     return ITEM_RESERVED;
00175                 }
00176             }
00177             // loan date
00178             $_loan_date = date('Y-m-d');
00179             // set loan rules
00180             self::setLoanRules($_d[1], $_d[2]);
00181             // calculate due date
00182             $_due_date = simbio_date::getNextDate($this->loan_periode, $_loan_date);
00183             $_due_date = simbio_date::getNextDateNotHoliday($_due_date, $this->holiday_dayname, $this->holiday_date);
00184             // check if due date is not more than member expiry date
00185             $_expiry_date_compare = simbio_date::compareDates($_due_date, $this->expire_date);
00186             if ($_expiry_date_compare != $this->expire_date) {
00187                 $_due_date = $this->expire_date;
00188             }
00189             $_curr_loan_num = count(parent::getItemLoan($this->item_loan_rules));
00190             $_curr_session_loan_num = count($_SESSION['temp_loan']);
00191             // get number of temporay loan session for specific loan rules
00192             if ($this->item_loan_rules) {
00193                 $_curr_session_loan_num = 0;
00194                 foreach ($_SESSION['temp_loan'] as $loan_session_item) {
00195                     if ($loan_session_item['loan_rules_id'] == $this->item_loan_rules) {
00196                         $_curr_session_loan_num++;
00197                     }
00198                 }
00199             }
00200 
00201             // check if we ignoring loan rules
00202             if (defined('IGNORE_LOAN_RULES')) {
00203                 $_SESSION['temp_loan'][$str_item_code] = array(
00204                     'item_code' => $str_item_code,
00205                     'loan_rules_id' => $this->item_loan_rules,
00206                     'title' => $_d[0],
00207                     'loan_date' => $_loan_date,
00208                     'due_date' => $_due_date
00209                 );
00210                 return ITEM_SESSION_ADDED;
00211             } else if ($this->loan_limit > ($_curr_loan_num + $_curr_session_loan_num)) {
00212                 // are the loan limit reached?
00213                 $_SESSION['temp_loan'][$str_item_code] = array(
00214                     'item_code' => $str_item_code,
00215                     'loan_rules_id' => $this->item_loan_rules,
00216                     'title' => $_d[0],
00217                     'loan_date' => $_loan_date,
00218                     'due_date' => $_due_date
00219                 );
00220                 return ITEM_SESSION_ADDED;
00221             } else {
00222                 return LOAN_LIMIT_REACHED;
00223             }
00224         } else {
00225             return ITEM_NOT_FOUND;
00226         }
00227     }

00235     public function removeLoanSession($str_item_code)
00236     {
00237         unset($_SESSION['temp_loan'][$str_item_code]);
00238     }

00246     public function returnItem($int_loan_id)
00247     {
00248         $_return_date = date('Y-m-d');
00249         // check for overdue
00250         $_fines = self::countOverdueValue($int_loan_id, $_return_date);
00251         // put data to fines table
00252         if ($_fines) {
00253             // set overdue flags
00254             $this->loan_have_overdue = true;
00255             $this->overdue_days = $_fines['days'];
00256             if (is_numeric($this->overdue_days) AND $this->overdue_days > 0) {
00257                 $this->obj_db->query("INSERT INTO fines VALUES(NULL, '$_return_date', '".$this->member_id ."', ".$_fines['value'].", 0, 'Overdue fines for item ".$_fines['item']."')");
00258             }
00259         }
00260         // update the loan data
00261         $this->obj_db->query("UPDATE loan SET is_return=1, return_date='$_return_date' WHERE loan_id=$int_loan_id AND member_id='".$this->member_id."' AND is_lent=1 AND is_return=0");
00262         // check if this item is being reserved by other member
00263         $_resv_q = $this->obj_db->query("SELECT l.item_code FROM reserve AS rs
00264             INNER JOIN loan AS l ON rs.item_code=l.item_code
00265             WHERE l.loan_id=$int_loan_id AND rs.member_id!='".$this->member_id."'");
00266         if ($_resv_q->num_rows > 0) {
00267             return ITEM_RESERVED;
00268         }
00269         return true;
00270     }

00273 
00279     public function extendItemLoan($int_loan_id)
00280     {
00281         // check if this item is being reserved by other member
00282         $_resv_q = $this->obj_db->query("SELECT l.item_code FROM reserve AS rs
00283             INNER JOIN loan AS l ON rs.item_code=l.item_code
00284             WHERE l.loan_id=$int_loan_id AND rs.member_id!='".$_SESSION['memberID']."'");
00285         if ($_resv_q->num_rows > 0) {
00286             return ITEM_RESERVED;
00287         }
00288         // return this item first
00289         self::returnItem($int_loan_id);
00290         // get loan rules for this loan
00291         $_loan_rules_q = $this->obj_db->query("SELECT loan_periode FROM mst_loan_rules AS lr LEFT JOIN
00292             loan AS l ON lr.loan_rules_id=l.loan_rules_id WHERE loan_id=$int_loan_id");
00293         if ($_loan_rules_q->num_rows > 0) {
00294             $_loan_rules_d = $_loan_rules_q->fetch_row();
00295             $this->loan_periode = $_loan_rules_d[0];
00296         }
00297         // due date
00298         $_loan_date = date('Y-m-d');
00299         // calculate due date
00300         $_due_date = simbio_date::getNextDate($this->loan_periode, $_loan_date);
00301         $_due_date = simbio_date::getNextDateNotHoliday($_due_date, $this->holiday_dayname, $this->holiday_date);
00302         $query = $this->obj_db->query("UPDATE loan SET renewed=renewed+1, due_date='$_due_date', is_return=0
00303             WHERE loan_id=$int_loan_id AND member_id='".$this->member_id."'");
00304         $_SESSION['reborrowed'][] = $int_loan_id;
00305         return true;
00306     }

00308 
00315     public function countOverdueValue($int_loan_id, $str_return_date)
00316     {
00317         $_on_grace_periode = false;
00318         // get due date for this loan
00319         $_loan_q = $this->obj_db->query("SELECT l.due_date, l.loan_rules_id, l.item_code FROM loan AS l WHERE loan_id=$int_loan_id");
00320         $_loan_d = $_loan_q->fetch_row();
00321         // compare dates
00322         $_date = simbio_date::compareDates($str_return_date, $_loan_d[0]);
00323         if ($_date == $str_return_date) {
00324             // how many days the overdue
00325             $_overdue_days = simbio_date::calcDay($str_return_date, $_loan_d[0]);
00326             // count holiday and subtract it from overdue days
00327             $_holiday_count = simbio_date::countHolidayBetween($_loan_d[0], $str_return_date, $this->holiday_dayname, $this->holiday_date);
00328             $_overdue_days = $_overdue_days-$_holiday_count;
00329             if ($_overdue_days < 1) {
00330                 return false;
00331             }
00332             // check for grace periode
00333             if (!empty($this->grace_periode)) {
00334                 $_due_plus_grace_date = simbio_date::getNextDate($this->grace_periode, $_loan_d[0]);
00335                 $_latest_date = simbio_date::compareDates($str_return_date, $_due_plus_grace_date);
00336                 if ($_latest_date == $_due_plus_grace_date) {
00337                     $_on_grace_periode = true;
00338                 }
00339             }
00340             // check for loan rules if any
00341             if (!empty($_loan_d[1])) {
00342                 $_loan_rules_q = $this->obj_db->query('SELECT fine_each_day, grace_periode FROM mst_loan_rules WHERE loan_rules_id='.$_loan_d[1]);
00343                 $_loan_rules_d = $_loan_rules_q->fetch_row();
00344                 $this->fine_each_day = $_loan_rules_d[0];
00345                 // check for grace periode
00346                 if (!empty($_loan_rules_d[1])) {
00347                     $_due_plus_grace_date = simbio_date::getNextDate($_loan_rules_d[1], $_loan_d[0]);
00348                     $_latest_date = simbio_date::compareDates($str_return_date, $_due_plus_grace_date);
00349                     if ($_latest_date == $_due_plus_grace_date) {
00350                         $_on_grace_periode = true;
00351                     }
00352                 }
00353             }
00354             // calculate fines value
00355             if ($_on_grace_periode) {
00356                 return array('days' => 'On Grace Periode', 'value' => 0, 'item' => $_loan_d[2]);
00357             } else {
00358                 $_fines_value = $this->fine_each_day*$_overdue_days;
00359                 return array('days' => $_overdue_days, 'value' => $_fines_value, 'item' => $_loan_d[2]);
00360             }
00361         }
00362         return false;
00363     }
00364

00370     public function getOverdueDays()
00371     {
00372         return $this->overdue_days;
00373     }

00380     public function finishLoanSession()
00381     {
00382         if (count($_SESSION['temp_loan']) > 0) {
00383             $error_num = 0;
00384             foreach ($_SESSION['temp_loan'] as $loan_item) {
00385                 // insert loan data to database
00386                 if ($loan_item['loan_rules_id']) {
00387                     $data['loan_rules_id'] = $loan_item['loan_rules_id'];
00388                 } else {
00389                     $data['loan_rules_id'] = 'literal{0}';
00390                 }
00391                 $data['item_code'] = $loan_item['item_code'];
00392                 $data['member_id'] = $this->member_id;
00393                 $data['loan_date'] = $loan_item['loan_date'];
00394                 $data['due_date'] = $loan_item['due_date'];
00395                 $data['renewed'] = 'literal{0}';
00396                 $data['is_lent'] = 1;
00397                 $data['is_return'] = 'literal{0}';
00398                 $sql_op = new simbio_dbop($this->obj_db);
00399                 if (!$sql_op->insert('loan', $data)) {
00400                     $error_num++;
00401                 } else {
00402                     // remove any reservation related to this items
00403                     @$this->obj_db->query('DELETE FROM reserve WHERE member_id=\''.$this->member_id.'\' AND item_code=\''.$data['item_code'].'\'');
00404                 }
00405             }
00406             // clean all circulation sessions
00407             $_SESSION['temp_loan'] = array();
00408             $_SESSION['reborrowed'] = array();
00409             unset($_SESSION['memberID']);
00410             // return the status
00411             if ($error_num) {
00412                 return TRANS_FLUSH_ERROR;
00413             } else {
00414                 return TRANS_FLUSH_SUCCESS;
00415             }
00416         } else {
00417             // clean all circulation sessions
00418             $_SESSION['temp_loan'] = array();
00419             $_SESSION['reborrowed'] = array();
00420             unset($_SESSION['memberID']);
00421         }
00422     }
